name: Boxador
tag_list: wazala, setster, brandbucket, adigami, listio, favo, taskio
overview:
Boxador is a technology incubator focused on the internet software space. Software products incubated are Setster, Wazala, Adigami and BrandBucket.

Boxador was founded in 2006 by Firas Bushnaq and Margot Bushnaq, veterans of the software space and founders of many technology companies such as WinWare, eCompany and eEye Digital Security.

Boxador operates out of their own co-working space [Boxaplex], located in West Hollywood CA. Boxador shares it’s office space with it’s incubations and few other creative agencies and online properties.

milestones.description: September 2009 Boxador announces Setster the Premier Online Appointment Scheduling Solution for Small to Medium Size Businesses
